subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] FM Sweep & Optical Microphone
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Cool, but I hear "this is more mature in the future".  I get them talking 
about what I'm doing, seeing, or hearing at any given moment, regardless of 
when the recording was done. I call it talk as if live.

Frank

>"This is Wurlitzer from the future"  Sounds musical.
>Dave
